tracktitle: Networking & Registration - Ask Me Anything Booths
Keynote: Sindhu Gangadharan (SVP & MD, SAP Labs India | Head User Enablement)

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Accelerate Application Development & Automation with SAP BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Build helps in accelerating development and automation across your enterprise. SAP Build Apps helps you create enterprise applications without code. SAP Build Process Automation enables you to automate workflow processes and tasks with simple drag-and-drop capabilities. SAP Build Work Zone enables you to design engaging sites to get work done quickly across all your enterprise applications. And with the announcement of SAP Build Code, it would enable Generative AI-based code development with Joule copilot, optimized for Java and JavaScript application development, providing a turn-key environment for coding, testing, integrations, and application lifecycle management.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Integrate S4 Service Order & FSM appointment offering in Appgyver via SAP Intelligent Service Cloud V2
sessionsBySequence.description:
Agent can also book appointments on behalf of customers for available slots, make a selection, and book a service appointment from the C4C.Booked appointments can be rescheduled and canceled within time constraints identified in the configuration.
Systems involved
1.Service cloud V2
2.SAP build Apps
3.FSM
4.S4

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Analytics Cloud: Just Ask
sessionsBySequence.description: The just ask feature of the SAP Analytics Cloud solution enables AI-driven natural language queries and upcoming conversational analytics. Learn about this new capability and discuss best practices. See for yourself how the feature can help business people with minimal analytics experience get answers to key business questions without knowing a query language. Understand the benefits it can provide your organization.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Generative AI Strategy and Offerings
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Generative AI Strategy and Offerings

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Accelerating Digital Adoption with SAP Enable Now
sessionsBySequence.description:
An essential aspect of business success is to prepare end users and employees for digital adoption. This is where a digital adoption platform like SAP Enable Now comes into play.
With SAP Enable Now, businesses can create and deliver any type of enablement — for any SAP and non-SAP application, for any topic area, for any channel, integrated with any source, and for all their employees.
Understand user enablement at SAP today, and see how digital transformation, along with the advent of generative AI, impacts and empowers the trajectory toward next-generation user enablement. Learn how user enablement can enhance your digital transformation by delivering a more personalized, interactive, and integrated enablement experience in the users’ language of choice.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Intelligent Expense using AI
sessionsBySequence.description: By integrating near real-time data and using Business AI to analyze transactions, businesses can see what they’re spending, improve compliance, and avoid possible blind spots in the budget. SAP Concur is imagining a world where travel and expenses practically manage themselves, helping businesses run at their best every day.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Harnessing the power of Resource Scheduling in S/4 Hana
sessionsBySequence.description: Discover the transformative capabilities of SAP's resource scheduling applications, designed to provide comprehensive insights into maintenance workloads and available capacities. With a focus on optimizing both current and upcoming maintenance activities, these apps empower users to assess work center utilization, construct schedules, and ascertain necessary capacities before deploying scheduled tasks. Dive into the strategic planning of assigning specific individuals to designated maintenance operations, factoring in their availability and roles at the work center. Join us as we explore the dynamic realm of resource scheduling, a key tool for streamlining operations and enhancing overall maintenance efficiency.
sessionsBySequence.organization: Bosch Global Software Technologies Pvt Ltd

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: "SAP Cloud ALM: A Comprehensive Overview and demo into Dynamic Alerting powered by AI. "
sessionsBySequence.description: SAP Cloud ALM helps you to implement and operate intelligent cloud and hybrid business solutions. SAP Cloud ALM now offers performance alerting without setting any fixed thresholds with the help of AI.
sessionsBySequence.tracktitle: SAP S/4HANA + Other Cloud Products (SF, CX)

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Data & Analytics portfolio, BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: Session on BTP, SAP Datasphere, SAC

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP CAP Journey - Beginner to Expert
sessionsBySequence.description: How to start as a beginner and then moved towards being an expert in SAP CAP

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business Objects to SAP Analytics Cloud
sessionsBySequence.description: Transition effortlessly from SAP Business Objects to SAP Analytics Cloud for a cutting-edge analytics experience. Explore seamless integration, enhanced data connectivity, and dynamic visualization capabilities. Uncover the benefits of this shift, optimizing your analytics strategy for agile and efficient decision-making. Join us to redefine your data-driven journey and embrace the advanced features of SAP Analytics Cloud.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Harness Inherent Power of Generative AI in SAP Build Process Automation
sessionsBySequence.description: The convergence of Generative AI and Process Automation has the potential to revolutionize the field, redefining our current understanding of process automation and low-code, no-code process design. During this session, we will explore how Generative AI capability with SAP Joule can enhance the design process, decision-making, and other aspects of future workflows. We will provide a demonstration showcasing how SAP Build Process Automation can enhance the experience of citizen developers through features such as recommendations, natural language-based modelling, editing, and summarization of complex objects.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Fiori Elements OData v4 and Flexible Programming Model
sessionsBySequence.description: FioriElements aims to achieve UX consistency and deliver high-quality UI5 applications. By focusing on streamlining the user experience, developers benefit from writing less UI code, leading to a significant reduction in maintenance costs. The implementation of a flexible programming model facilitates the extension of  apps though  accessible extension points.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Concur strategy & Roadmap powered by GenAI
sessionsBySequence.description:
Companies today are planning their digital journeys- transforming business models, reengineering business processes, and
reimagining work.This session will help our customers to understand the Concur strategy by highlighting innovations powered by GenAI to plan and implement their digital journey in the upcoming Roadmap

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP S/4HANA Test Automation Tool : Simplified Customer Tests
sessionsBySequence.description: The SAP S/4HANA Test Automation Tool is available to all public cloud customers and comes with pre-delivered SAP Best Practice Content. Based on no-code approach you can build a regression suite containing both UI and API automates giving a great level of flexibility to building your regression suite.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Business AI strategy and Partnership opportunities
sessionsBySequence.description: The session will cover overall strategy of business transformation by Generative AI , roads map and key innovations like Joule, GenAI hub and build etc. you will also learn about partnerships/co-innovation opportunities with SAP for business AI

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Exploring guidelines and best practices of SAP RAP
sessionsBySequence.description: Get an overview of some of the guidelines and best practices for development in SAP RAP. Be it in S/4 HANA or ABAP BTP, having a solid understanding of these considerations will surely bring your app development to the next level.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Explore SAP API management policies
sessionsBySequence.description: This session will focus on SAP APIM policies. It will also include live/recorded demo of 1 end to end integration scenario using APIM and Cloud Integration.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: DOX- Premium AI Service
sessionsBySequence.description: DOX- Premium AI Service

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Enhance Your Software experience with UA
sessionsBySequence.description: Finding the right information at the right time is the key!  In this session, we will tell you how you can search for SAP documentation on SAP Help Portal. We will also show you what are the new features available for feedback and commenting on SAP Help Portal. We will also explain how you can use the SAP What's New Viewer.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Next-Gen Intelligent Invoicing
sessionsBySequence.description: Concur Next Gen Invoice is an innovative product powered by General Artificial Intelligence (Gen AI). This technology introduces a paradigm shift from the current solution, enhancing Purchase Order (PO) matching with precise logic, and improving the efficiency and accuracy of in-house procedures. Invoice product, with LLM and Gen AI, revolutionizes invoice processing with its superior decision-making capabilities, reduced manual work, and enhanced data insights making it a trusted option for businesses striving for operational excellence.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Increase Productivity in Hybrid HR Landscapes with Cross-System Workflow
sessionsBySequence.description: Cross-system workflow for SAP SuccessFactors running on SAP Business Technology Platform support existing on-premise HCM customers in their cloud journey by overcoming integration challenges when running HR business processes across a core hybrid landscape involving Employee Central and SAP ERP HCM Payroll. HR professionals will now have end to end transparency on all the process steps and perform their daily data maintenance activities much more efficiently by using a new Worklist UI build using SAP Build Process Automation capabilities.
sessionsBySequence.tracktitle: SAP S/4HANA + Other Cloud Products (SF, CX)

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Two-Tier ERP with SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud: Taking Your Business to New Heights
sessionsBySequence.description:
This session aims to explain partners and customers about the Two-Tier ERP strategy using SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and its benefits for organizations. Key points include how this strategy:
•	Enables independent decision-making at various levels, maintaining corporate compliance.
•	Enhances operational efficiency via streamlined processes, uniform reporting, and informed decision-making.
•	Serves as a vital consideration for subsidiaries and headquarters, highlighting our current capabilities.
•	Shapes future direction utilizing Business AI capabilities.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Build Resilient Applications on SAP BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: Build Resilient Applications on SAP BTP

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Strategic Insights: SAP Analytics Cloud and Business Warehouse in Powering Intelligent Enterprises.
sessionsBySequence.description:
In today's competitive landscape, intelligent enterprises leverage data-driven insights to make informed decisions and achieve strategic goals. Discover how SAP Analytics Cloud and SAP Business Warehouse act as your data powerhouses, unlocking hidden insights through analytics and a robust, centralized data foundation.

Key Takeaways:
•	Witness how data and analytics drive intelligent decision-making across business functions.
•	Explore the capabilities of SAP Analytics Cloud for self-service analytics, automated insights, and collaborative decision-making.
•	Uncover the power of SAP Business Warehouse for data consolidation, scalability, and security.
•	Learn how these solutions work together, guiding you on your path to becoming a data-powered leader.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Automate Business Processes at Enterprise Scale Leveraging the Ecosystem
sessionsBySequence.description: Learn through typical business scenarios how the SAP Build Process Automation solution can be integrated with other automation tools, application development, user interface design, third-party tools for personal productivity, and more. Benefit from the plethora of APIs available and the open ecosystem.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: More secure and seamless access to customer objects in Fiori Launchpad
sessionsBySequence.description:
Search Models are entities that enable users to find business objects in the Fiori Launchpad.
Now, customers can easily and securely create these search models themselves, as they have the capability to generate their own business objects

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Extend Concur Request with External Systems
sessionsBySequence.description: The Launch External URL callout gives clients and third-party developers the ability to extend the functionality of the SAP Concur platform providing a means to deliver custom user interactions, or access functionality found in an external system. The client can add a Request Header, Expected Expense Entry, or Allocation form field that is configured to use the Launch External URL callout. Concur Request will display this field with an attached button that launches a separate browser window when clicked. The window is controlled by an application connector, created by a third-party developer or the client. The application connector is a web server that presents information in the window.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: The New Age Intelligent Situation Handling in S4HANA
sessionsBySequence.description: Situation Handling helps your business to run smoothly by automatically informing the right users about any situations that need their attention. This includes, for example, upcoming deadlines, delays, expiring contracts, and so on.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SuccessFactors Foundation Object(Organization Structure) - SAP CPI integration
sessionsBySequence.description: Case study on SuccessFactors Foundation Object(Organisation structure) as generic integration to multiple target systems via SAP CI. This provides a lot of value add in HR landscape when the SuccessFactors EC is the source with Organisation structure and target systems like Recruitment, Access Management, Learning Management.
sessionsBySequence.tracktitle: SAP S/4HANA + Other Cloud Products (SF, CX)

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Unlocking Innovation: Exploring Low-Code Pro-Code Solutions in SAP
sessionsBySequence.description: Exploring Low-Code Pro-Code Solutions in SAP

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Deep Dive into RAP Developer Extensibility
sessionsBySequence.description: ABAP RESTful programming Model (RAP) Developer Extensibility is about how to enable and develop extension for RAP Business Objects

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Graph capability within the SAP Integration Suite
sessionsBySequence.description: This session will exploring the SAP Graph capability within the SAP Integration Suite. The agenda includes a comprehensive overview of creating a Business Data graph using SAP Intelligent Enterprise Solutions (IES) entities and custom entities, featuring an offline demonstration to enhance practical understanding.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: AI Integration into Business Applications with Intelligent Scenario Lifecycle Management (ISLM)
sessionsBySequence.description: Join us as we explore the capabilities of Intelligent Scenario Lifecycle Management (ISLM). Learn how this framework seamlessly integrates AI into your applications and optimizes the operation of AI workloads across SAP HANA, SAP AI Core, and SAP AI Services on the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP). Discover the advanced features and gain insights into the roadmap, with a special focus on the upcoming integration of generative AI.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Mobile Start: Intelligent Enterprise at your fingertips
sessionsBySequence.description:
SAP Mobile Start acts as the native entry point for mobile users accessing SAP solutions. Facilitates access to business content deployed on SAP Build Work Zone, standard edition, via mobile devices. Built on SAP Business Technology Platform (SAP BTP) for quick access to apps and content of your Intelligent Enterprise with improved UX and helps to increase productivity at work.

Features and benefits:
+ Provides a centralized overview of business processes on smart devices.
+ Users can customize their home screens with widgets for personalized access.
+ Enables 24/7 on-the-go access to SAP business processes and software.
+ Offers search functionality on Apple products for efficient app discovery and launching.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Model Enterprise Responsibilities for a Business User in Cloud - BTP
sessionsBySequence.description: Come learn and experience how SAP Responsibility Management service in BTP is now helping BTP applications to model enterprise responsibilities for a business user easily. With it’s strong Query APIs and easy modelling of data , the RM service will soon become the central place for responsibility modelling as the need of managing responsibilities for a business user remains the same in Cloud and On Premise.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Ariba SCC & Request 2 source accelerator
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session i am going to talk about Ariba SCC direct procurement and we are co-Innovation with SAP Ariba on product development Request 2 source.
sessionsBySequence.tracktitle: SAP S/4HANA + Other Cloud Products (SF, CX)

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: End-to-End Use Cases with SAP BTP, SAP S/4HANA, and other SAP Cloud Products
sessionsBySequence.description: End-to-End Use Cases with SAP BTP, SAP S/4HANA, and other SAP Cloud Products

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Event Driven Enterprise Applications in SAP BTP - Using CAP and RAP
sessionsBySequence.description: In this session we will explore event driven architecture using BTP Event Mesh Service. Understand how to build applications using CAP and RAP which are event consumers and producers . Explore on use cases implemented using Event Driven Architecture.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Governance in SAP Integration
sessionsBySequence.description: Various best practices around governance of sap integration

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Improve Customer Experience with the Power of Business Entity Recognition and SAP BPA
sessionsBySequence.description:
Business Entity Recognition helps to detect and highlight any type of business entity.

Benefits of Business Entity Recognition:
Reduced Manual and Repetitive Work: Allow the members of your organization to focus on more relevant tasks within their field of expertise.
Efficient Handling of Text Documents: Process a higher volume of text documents more efficiently and quickly.
Enhanced Quality and Compliance: Improve the quality and compliance of your text document handling processes.

Business Scenario Use Case:
By leveraging a combination of Business Entity Recognition and SAP BPA, our goal is to automate the Customer PO status inquiry via email to our sales team. SAP BPA will read the email, extract the PO number using GenAI (ChatGPT), and pass it to SAP S4HANA APIs to retrieve the status. The system will then generate an auto-reply to the inquiry email in real-time.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: How to use FIORI Application variant for FIORI Application development?
sessionsBySequence.description: By creating an application variant from standard FIORI application, It is possible to adapt the UI of base application, deploy it as separate FIORI app and further extend it. Since last few releases, there are various possibilities to use UI extensions in adapted project. In this session, we will also see some SAP standard use cases where FIORI elements applications have been delivered using app variants with latest OData V4 implemented in ABAP RAP.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Build Extensions with developer extensibility in 3-System Landscape (3SL) using SAP Business Accelerator Hub
sessionsBySequence.description:
Developer extensibility allows you to create development projects in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition solution. It gives you the opportunity to develop cloud-ready and upgrade-stable custom ABAP code on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public edition combining the benefits of custom ABAP code, with the required restrictions for Cloud readiness, and the SAP S/4HANA programming model to build SAP Fiori apps. Developer extensibility is only available in a 3-system landscape. The list of pre-built extensions that are available to be readily used by end-users can be explored on SAP Extensibility Explorer.
https://api.sap.com/products/SAPS4HANACloud/developerextensibility

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Developing Gen AI applications on SAP BTP following Reference architecture
sessionsBySequence.description: Learn how to develop applications and extensions using GenAI Hub by following the Reference Architecture published in the discovery center. You will also see how our customers and partners had leveraged this architecture for their usecases.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Cross-cloud Modelling with SAP Datasphere and Hyperscalar Data Sources
sessionsBySequence.description: This session will focus on how SAP Datasphere facilitates the integration of data from diverse hyperscaler sources like Databricks, Google Big query and also with SAP sources like Concur, Successfactors, promoting seamless interoperability.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Gen AI-enabled SAP’s business co-pilot
sessionsBySequence.description: Gen AI-enabled SAP’s business co-pilot

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP Workzone Advance Edition
sessionsBySequence.description: In this presentation, we are planning to include the SAP WorkZone advance edition as an Introduction and explain its features. Explain the difference between SAP Fiori Launchpad, SAP Workzone Standard Edition, and SAP Build Workzone Advance Edition and its Capabilities. Explain why a customer or partner should choose SAP Workzone Advance Edition. The existing Usecase and Demo (how to create a site within the workspace with widgets, and UI Integration cards using SAP Build Advance edition). Discuss the benefits of the Workzone Advance edition.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: SAP S/4HANA Migration Cockpit
sessionsBySequence.description: The SAP S/4HANA migration cockpit facilitates the transfer of business data from an SAP ERP source system to SAP S/4HANA. The SAP S/4HANA migration cockpit uses migration objects to identify and transfer the relevant data. A migration object describes how to migrate data for a specific business object to SAP S/4HANA. It contains information about the relevant source and target structures, as well as the relationships between these structures. It also contains mapping information for the relevant fields, as well as any rules used to convert values that are migrated from source fields to target fields. SAP provide predefined migration objects that you can use to transfer your data.

sessionsBySequence.sessiontitle: Memory Consumption Dashboard for Information Lifecycle Management (ILM) Objects
sessionsBySequence.description: Growing memory consumption leads to increased subscription costs for our customers when running SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition. Thanks to the enablement of ILM objects for the memory usage reporting, the ILM Advisor provides transparency on the ILM objects that drive the growth of memory consumption. Customers can now take an informed decision on triggering ILM actions to reduce the memory consumption by archiving data. You will learn about ILM Advisor app which provides a comprehensive overview of memory consumption based on ILM objects  in SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
sessionsBySequence.tracktitle: SAP S/4HANA + Other Cloud Products (SF, CX)
